title: Vice President Biden hosts conference calls with governors and local officials to discuss recovery act implementation, 6-10-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 10, 2009

 



Vice President Biden hosts conference calls with governors and local officials to discuss recovery act implementation, 6-10-09




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President  ________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                             June 10, 2009  VICE PRESIDENT BIDEN HOSTS CONFERENCE CALLS   WITH GOVERNORS AND LOCAL OFFICIALS TO DISCUSS RECOVERY ACT IMPLEMENTATION  Earlier today, the Vice President hosted two conference calls with Governors and Mayors/County Executives from across the country to discuss implementation of the Recovery Act. The following elected officials participated: GOVERNORS:  Governor John Baldacci (D-ME) Governor Dave Heineman (R-NE) Governor Bill Ritter (D-CO)  MAYORS / COUNTY EXECUTIVES:  Mayor Norm Archibald (R – Abilene, TX) Mayor William V. 'Bill' Bell (D – Durham, NC) Mayor Dean DePiero (D – Parma, OH) Mayor Molly Ward (D – Hampton, VA) County Commissioner Harry B. Montoya (D – Santa Fe County, NM) County Executive Pat McCarthy (D – Pierce County, WA)
